definition: a container used for carrying money and small personal items or accessories (especially by women)
details:
noun
- a container used for carrying money and small personal items or accessories (especially by women)
= synonyms: bag
- pocket-sized paperback book
= synonyms: pocket book, pocket edition
- a pocket-size case for holding papers and paper money
= synonyms: wallet, billfold, notecase
- your personal financial means
= example: your personal financial means
